name: Son of Sun
description:
Game Story:

the Sun has a son called sunn.....The sun and his son was very happy in their tiny world  

One day son asked to  his father that who is his mother The father that replied she is every
where . but son wanted to see his mother so his father give him permission to go to earth and see

her but he should come back in 10 days , The problem son don't know where is his mother
in this big earth and he decided to go to earth and see ,
can the son can found his mother""?

Game play:

The player is son is trying to find his mother in earth.The game play is to reach to his mother in 10
days. The son is going to earth so for son Earth is a completly different world compared to space ,

The player should continue walk to the end of each level if the player fall down he should stuck
their so the game will restart the entire day.The 10 levels are the 10 days of earth and each level
is a journey so each level are different environment, The game can offer over 40 minutes of game play

Player character:

Son: Son is the Sun of sun , sun has a small Ball structure orange in color also had a small white
curve in the top right which is the symbol of water the player character have the ability to overcome
fire and water at the same time but he can't make it.

Player controls:

  picture of arrow keys

Game World:

The world of Son of sun is inspired by the beauty of earth.

Different weathers and different Environments can experience in this 10 levels.

The overall focus of the story is the mother of son and that is earth.

Game Experience:

walking to the entire earth in 10 levels to find the mother so there are some challenges to complete
in each levels which is like a puzzle.

How to win:

In this game all levels are unlocked in which to ensure that player should not begin stuck in any level
the story should go on if the player can't complete the challenges.

How to lose:

If the player can't  solve the puzzle

Game Mechanics:

Sun: Son of sun , is a 2D platformer, In which the player can only move forward and backward , the
camera ankle is fixed and following the player.
